it.univr.beans

Class AbstractDataSourceBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.univr.beans.AbstractDataSourceBean
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ViewStateBean

    public abstract class AbstractDataSourceBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe astratta che contiene tutti i Datasource necessari ai Bean.
    Author:
    Matteo Olivato, Federico Bianchi
